description: This file contains SQL migration scripts to set up the initial database schema, including extension creation, domain and enum definitions, table creation with constraints and indexes, trigger functions, and placeholders for row-level security policies for a financial application using Postgres and Supabase.

methods.name: public.current_user_id
methods.description: Function to get the current authenticated user's UUID.

methods.name: public.set_updated_at
methods.description: Trigger function to automatically update the 'updated_at' timestamp on row modifications.
